name: Crown of Torag
description:
A mysterious evil force grows to the east of Kingdom of Otsiela. The once peaceful land is plagued by constant raids and famine. New rumors catches king's ears that there might be a way to fight back, to the east of Otsiela stands a mine of Olso, inside lurks unspoken dangers and the heart of evil - Lord Torag himself. Your objective is to destroy him and restore the peace to the once peaceful land.

Crown of Torag is an Indie game developed by one person. All of the sprites, coding and music was done by me. If you enjoy the game don't forget to review and express your opinion about it. If you have encountered a bug don't hesitate to email me at zeromassgames@gmail.com and let me know.
